displayName.spanish: Si no estás seguro, pisa a fondo

description.english: Drive at least 150 metres (420 feet) at 150 Km/h (93 mph)
description.french: Pilotez au moins 150 mètres (420 pieds) à 150 km/h (93 mph)
description.german: Fahr mindestens 150 m (420 Fuß) mit 150 km/h (93 mph)
description.italian: Percorri almeno 150 metri (420 piedi) a 150 Km
description.spanish: Conduce al menos 150 m (420 pies) a 150 km/h (93 mph)

description.english: Open the car repair screen in the Service Park
description.french: Ouvrez l'écran de réparation de la voiture dans le Service Park
description.german: Öffne das Reparaturfenster im Service Park
description.italian: Entra nella schermata di riparazione dell'auto nel Service Park
description.spanish: Abre la pantalla de reparación de coches en el Service Park

description.english: Open the car setup screen in the Service Park
description.french: Ouvrez l'écran de préparation de la voiture dans le Service Park
description.german: Öffne das Einstellungsfenster im Service Park
description.italian: Entra nella schermata dell'assetto dell'auto nel Service Park
description.spanish: Abre la pantalla de ajustes en el Service Park

description.english: Win a special stage in any offline mode
description.french: Remportez un Special Stage dans n'importe quel mode hors ligne
description.german: Gewinn eine Special Stage im Offline-Modus
description.italian: Vinci una Special Stage in qualsiasi modalità offline
description.spanish: Gana una Special Stage en cualquier modo offline

description.english: Drive at least 200 Km (124 miles) on valid special stages
description.french: Pilotez au moins 200 km (124 miles) sur des Special Stages valables
description.german: Fahr mindestens 200 km (124 Meilen) in zulässigen Special Stages
description.italian: Percorri almeno 200 Km (124 miglia) in Special Stage valide
description.spanish: Conduce al menos 200 km (124 mi) en Special Stages válidas

description.english: Complete at least one special stage in each rally in the game
description.french: Terminez au moins un Special Stage dans chacun des rallyes du jeu
description.german: Schließ mindestens eine Special Stage in jeder Rallye des Spiels ab
description.italian: Completa almeno una Special Stage per ogni rally nel gioco
description.spanish: Completa al menos una Special Stage en cada rally del juego

description.english: Win at least one special stage in each category in the game (WRC, WRC 2, WRC 3, Junior WRC)
description.french: Remportez au moins un Special Stage dans toutes les catégories (WRC, WRC 2, WRC 3, Junior WRC)
description.german: Gewinn mindestens eine Special Stage in jeder Klasse des Spiels (WRC, WRC 2, WRC 3 und Junior WRC)
description.italian: Vinci almeno una Special Stage in ogni categoria del gioco (WRC, WRC 2, WRC 3, Junior WRC)
description.spanish: Gana al menos una Special Stage de cada categoría del juego (WRC, WRC 2, WRC 3, Junior WRC)

description.english: Enter Quick Stage mode
description.french: Accédez au mode Spéciale rapide
description.german: Geh in den Schnellrennen-Modus
description.italian: Entra nella modalità Stage Veloce
description.spanish: Entra en el modo Speed Stage

description.english: Win the Vodafone Rally de Portugal with M. Østberg. Offline rally with three day calendar
description.french: Remportez le Vodafone Rally de Portugal avec M. Østberg. Rallye hors ligne en 3 jours
description.german: Gewinn die Vodafone Rally de Portugal mit M. Østberg. Offline-Rallye mit Drei-Tage-Kalender
description.italian: Vinci il Vodafone Rally de Portugal con M. Østberg. Rally offline e con calendario di tre giorni
description.spanish: Gana el Vodafone Rally de Portugal con M. Østberg. Rally offline con calendario de tres días

description.spanish: Gana el Rallye de France-Alsace con S. Ogier. Rally offline con calendario de tres días
